data.text: Asɛm a ɛfiri Awurade nkyɛn baa Yeremia hɔ nie:
“Yei ne deɛ Awurade, Israel Onyankopɔn, seɛ: ‘Twerɛ nsɛm a maka akyerɛ wo nyinaa gu nwoma mu.
Nna bi reba,’ sɛdeɛ Awurade seɛ, ‘a mede me nkurɔfoɔ Israelfoɔ ne Yudafoɔ bɛfiri nnommum mu asane aba na mede wɔn aba asase a mede me maa wɔn agyanom sɛ wɔmfa ntena so,’ Awurade na ɔseɛ.”
Yei ne nsɛm a Awurade ka faa Israel ne Yuda ho:
“Deɛ Awurade seɛ nie:
Mommisa na monhunu:
Sɛdeɛ da no bɛyɛ hu afa!
“ ‘Saa ɛda no,’ Asafo Awurade na ɔseɛ,
Na mmom wɔbɛsom Awurade, wɔn Onyankopɔn
“ ‘Enti nsuro, Ao Yakob, me ɔsomfoɔ;
Me ne wo wɔ hɔ na mɛgye wo nkwa,’
“Yei ne deɛ Awurade seɛ:
Obiara nni hɔ a ɔbɛka bi ama wo,
Wʼapamfoɔ nyinaa werɛ afiri wo;
Adɛn enti na wosu denden wɔ wʼapirakuro ho,
“ ‘Nanso wɔbɛsɛe wɔn a wɔsɛe mo;
Nanso mɛma wo ahoɔden bio
“Yei ne deɛ Awurade seɛ:
Wɔn mu na aseda nnwom bɛfiri aba
Wɔn mma bɛdi yie sɛ kane no,
Wɔn adikanfoɔ bɛyɛ wɔn mu baako;
‘Enti mobɛyɛ me nkurɔfoɔ,
Hwɛ, Awurade ahum
Awurade abufuo rennwo
